data.title: Joseph Andrews Candlefaq - Paris, Ontario
data.meta_description: Andrews, Joseph Harold Passed away, peacefully, on December 17th 2010 at Park Lane Terrace in Paris Ontario. Joe was born in Sydney Nova Scotia in 1940, moving to Ontario in 1966. He resided in Cambridge until moving to Park Lane Terrace. Joe was a safety consultant with the Farm Safety Association from 1976 until his retirement in 2004. He is survived by his family, Joan, sons Robert, Joseph (Liisa), daughter Julie (Ian Short), and grandchildren Katie, John, and Cayman. With Deep Gratitude to the wonderful staff of Park Lane , Dr Robert Williams, Pastor John MacPhail, and Wm. Kipp Funeral Home for their care and compassion. A very special thank you to the staff of Sunrise Court. Cremation has taken place. A Memorial Service will be held at Park Lane Terrace on Wednesday December 29, 2010 at 2:30.    Memorial donations may be made to Park Lane Terrace or the Alzheimer's Society. Online condolences or donations may be arranged through www.wmkippfuneralhome.com or by contacting Wm. KIPP  519-442-3061.  May you rest in peace, Dad. ~your family
